sentences.en: Although she came from a family of bankers, Franklin set her sights on a career in scientific research.
sentences.cn: 尽管出身于银行家家庭，富兰克林还是决心从事科研事业。

sentences.en: Among the most spectacular sights are the great sea-bird colonies.
sentences.cn: 庞大的海鸟群是最壮观的景象之一。

sentences.en: Any decent shot with telescopic sights could pick us off at random.
sentences.cn: 任何借助望远镜瞄准器的像样射手都可以随意把我们逐个干掉。

sentences.en: During our two - day stopover in Bangkok we saw most of the sights.
sentences.cn: 在曼谷中途停留的两天里,我们游览了大部分景点.

sentences.en: Holidays are for seeing the sights, hearing the language and savouring the smells.
sentences.cn: 度假是为了赏风景之美，听语言之妙，品百味之香。

sentences.en: I explained to them that three days in the city were very little time to see all the sights.
sentences.cn: 我向他们说明,要把这城市的风光都看到三天是远远不够的.

sentences.en: In 1901, he broke out of vaudeville and set his sights on Broadway.
sentences.cn: 1901年，他放弃了杂耍表演，决定到百老汇发展。

sentences.en: ITV has set its sights on winning a younger and more upmarket audience.
sentences.cn: 独立电视公司已着眼于赢得更年轻、更高端的观众群。

sentences.en: Once at Elgin day-trippers visit a number of local sights.
sentences.cn: 一到达埃尔金，一日游的游客就参观了一些当地的风景名胜。

sentences.en: The displays in Harrods are one of the sights in London.
sentences.cn: 哈罗德百货公司的陈列品是伦敦一景.

sentences.en: The Grand Canyon is one of the sights of the world.
sentences.cn: (科罗拉多)大峡谷是世界名胜之一.

sentences.en: The Great Wall is one of the sights of the world.
The practice of hanging clothes across the street is a common sight in many parts of the city.
sentences.cn: 在大街上晾晒衣服在该市的许多地区是很常见的景象。

sentences.en: They have set their sights on the world record.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标是冲击世界纪录。

sentences.en: We just do not set our sights high enough.
sentences.cn: 我们设定的目标不够高远。

sentences.en: We'd toured the sights of Paris.
sentences.cn: 我们游览了巴黎的风景名胜。
